summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing transportation charges for services rendered on July 29, 2002. It includes information about the sender, recipient, and payment details, along with a summary of charges and discounts applied.

persons.name: Lauren K1
persons.context: Lauren K1 is listed as the sender of the package sent via FedEx.

persons.name: Paul Hoffman
persons.context: Paul Hoffman is identified as the recipient of the package sent via FedEx.

persons.name: E. Simon
persons.context: E. Simon is noted as the individual who signed for the delivery of the package.

connections.description: Lauren K1 sent a package to Paul Hoffman via FedEx.

events.title: Package Sent
events.description: A package was picked up by FedEx for delivery to Paul Hoffman.

events.title: Package Delivered
events.description: The package sent by Lauren K1 was delivered to Paul Hoffman.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated August 2, 2002, for services rendered on July 29, 2002.
Total charges for the transportation were $18.45, with a discount of $9.50 applied.
The package was delivered on July 30, 2002, at 14:57.
E. Simon signed for the delivery of the package.
The invoice includes a fuel surcharge of $0.45.
